org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class FSImageStorageInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSImageStorageInspector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FSImagePreTransactionalStorageInspector, FSImageTransactionalStorageInspector

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
abstract class FSImageStorageInspector
extends Object
    Interface responsible for inspecting a set of storage directories and devising a plan to load the namespace from them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  FSImageStorageInspector.FSImageFile
      Record of an image that has been located and had its filename parsed.

      • inspectDirectory

        abstract void inspectDirectory(Storage.StorageDirectory sd)
                        throws IOException
        Inspect the contents of the given storage directory.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isUpgradeFinalized

        abstract boolean isUpgradeFinalized()
        Returns:
        false if any of the storage directories have an unfinalized upgrade

      • getLatestImages

        abstract List<FSImageStorageInspector.FSImageFile> getLatestImages()
                                                            throws IOException
        Get the image files which should be loaded into the filesystem.
        Throws:
        IOException - if not enough files are available (eg no image found in any directory)

      • getMaxSeenTxId

        abstract long getMaxSeenTxId()
        Get the minimum tx id which should be loaded with this set of images.

      • needToSave

        abstract boolean needToSave()
        Returns:
        true if the directories are in such a state that the image should be re-saved following the load
